statements: SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule;
SELECT schedule_id, date FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE location='Studio A';
SELECT photographer_id, date, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE photographer_id='abc123';
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT photographer_id, schedule_id FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE location='Beach' ORDER BY photographer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule;
SELECT photographer_id, date, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, photographer_id FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE location = 'Studio A';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shoots FROM photo_shoot_schedule;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE photographer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT id, date, location, photographer_id FROM photo_shoots;
SELECT * FROM photographers WHERE speciality = 'Wedding';
SELECT name, speciality FROM photographers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM photographers WHERE id IN (1, 4, 7);
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, date, location FROM photo_shoots WHERE location = 'Beach' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, name, speciality FROM photographers WHERE speciality = 'Weddings' AND name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE photographer_id IN (SELECT id FROM photographers WHERE speciality = 'Portraits');
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_shoots FROM photo_shoots GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_shoots DESC;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots;
SELECT shoot_id, date, location FROM photo_shoots WHERE photographer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM photographers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT assignment_id, shoot_id, photographer_id, assignment_date FROM assignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT specialty, name FROM photographers WHERE specialty = 'Wedding Photography';
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT p.name, a.assignment_date, ps.location FROM photographers p JOIN assignments a ON p.photographer_id = a.photographer_id JOIN photo_shoots ps ON a.shoot_id = ps.shoot_id;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoots WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY location;
SELECT p.name, ps.location FROM photographers p JOIN photo_shoots ps ON p.photographer_id = ps.photographer_id WHERE p.specialty='Weddings';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shoots, p.specialty FROM photographers p JOIN assignments a ON p.photographer_id = a.photographer_id GROUP BY p.specialty ORDER BY total_shoots DESC;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule;
SELECT id, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE photographer_id = 1;
SELECT date, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT event_name, date, location_id FROM events WHERE location_id = 2 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT id, name, contact FROM photographers;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule
SELECT id, date, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE photographer_id = 1
SELECT event_name, date, l.name, p.name FROM events e JOIN locations l ON e.location_id = l.id JOIN photographers p ON e.photographer_id = p.id
SELECT id, name, contact FROM photographers WHERE name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE address IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM locations;
SELECT id, name, phone_number FROM photographers;
SELECT type_name FROM photo_shoot_types;
SELECT id, date, location FROM photo_shoot_schedule ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedule_images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM photo_shoot_schedule;
SELECT location, date, photographer_id FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE location='New York';
SELECT ps.date, p.name, l.city FROM photo_shoot_schedule ps JOIN photographers p ON ps.photographer_id = p.id JOIN locations l ON ps.location = l.address;
SELECT p.name, s.type_name FROM photographers p JOIN photo_shoot_schedule ps ON p.id = ps.photographer_id JOIN photo_shoot_types s ON ps.id = s.id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shoots FROM photo_shoot_schedule WHERE photographer_id=2;
